original_text: So I, the Almighty Lord, promise you this, as surely as I live. I will allow your enemies to kill you. If you run away from them, they will chase you and kill you. You were happy to see an enemy kill my people, so an enemy will kill you also.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 내가 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 내가 너에게 피를 만나게 한즉 피가 너를 따르리라 네가 피를 미워하지 아니하였은즉 피가 너를 따르리라

sentences.original_text: So I, the Almighty Lord, promise you this
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나 전능한 주께서 너에게 이것을 약속하노니

sentences.original_text: I will allow your enemies to kill you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네 원수들이 너를 죽이도록 허락하리라

sentences.original_text: If you run away from them
they will chase you and kill you
You were happy to see an enemy kill my people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 원수가 나의 백성을 죽이는 것을 보고 기뻐했었으니

sentences.original_text: so an enemy will kill you also
